actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to renew the temporary suspension of duty on 2-oxepanone, polymer with aziridine and tetrahydro-2H-pyran-2-one, dodecanoate ester.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporarily extend the suspension of duty on 2-oxepanone, polymer with aziridine and tetrahydro-2H-pyran-2-one, dodecanoate ester.

titles.title: A bill to renew the temporary suspension of duty on 2-oxepanone, polymer with aziridine and tetrahydro-2H-pyran-2-one, dodecanoate ester.
